item.title: Harry Potter – CTF Walkthrough
item.description: Blog TryHackMe, Write-Up, CTF Harry Potter – CTF Walkthrough Harry Potter CTF walkthrough, This is the official write-up, and I will guide you through the whole process step by step. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date July 25, 2023 CTF Walkthrough Hello there, welcome to the official write-up of Harry Potter – CTF. I created this room for fun. I made this room in a few hours. If anyone is interested in knowing how to create a TryHackMe room, please comment down.

item.title: India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech
item.description: Blog Privacy, Free Speech, Encryption India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech India's ban on encrypted messaging apps undermines privacy and free speech, setting a dangerous precedent for democracy and citizens' rights. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date June 27, 2023 India’s Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps “Privacy is not a privilege, it is a fundamental right.” - Edward Snowden In a shocking move, India, once hailed as the world’s largest democracy, has taken a giant leap towards eroding privacy and stifling free speech by banning encrypted messaging apps on a massive scale.

item.title: About
item.description: ABOUT Welcome to my About page. Introduction Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Rahul Setrakian, and I am a versatile professional specializing in web development, software development (primarily Python), network administration, content creation, digital marketing, and basic cybersecurity. With a passion for programming and a drive for continuous learning, I bring a diverse set of skills and expertise to the table. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on various projects and collaborate with clients from different industries.

item.title: Contact
item.description: CONTACT Get in touch with me. Contact If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to me: Work Hours Monday - Saturday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Contact Info Telegram: @anonymouscharon Email: rahulsetrakian@gmail.com Message Me Send Message Social Media

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: PORTFOLIO Check out my amazing portfolio. Portfolio × Visit space NoName Bot Created Python Telegram bot using python-telegram-bot module for seamless communication on Telegram platform. Read More Bluecity Cab Crafted BlueCity Cab website with the power of Tailwind CSS, delivering a sleek and modern design for an enhanced user experience. Read More HarryPotter CTF Developed HarryPotter-themed CTF (Capture The Flag) challenge, immersing participants in the magical world of Harry Potter while testing their skills.

item.title: Thank You for Submission
item.description: Thank You for Submission Thanks for reaching out. I'll respond as soon as possible.
